points.title: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes

case.title: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
case.localized_title: Les conditions peuvent être modifiées à tout moment, mais vous recevrez une notification des modifications.
case.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.

points.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

case.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
case.localized_title: Les cookies utilisés par ce service ne contiennent pas d'informations permettant de vous identifier personnellement
case.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.

points.title: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is friendlier to user privacy protection

case.title: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is friendlier to user privacy protection
case.localized_title: Vos données sont traitées et stockées dans un pays plus favorable à la protection de la vie privée des utilisateurs.
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for strong data regulations and user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies de première partie peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

case.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
case.localized_title: Ce service est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation individuelle et non commerciale.
case.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.

points.title: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

case.title: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
case.localized_title: Il vous est interdit de tenter d'obtenir un accès non autorisé à d'autres systèmes informatiques
case.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.
